entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:56 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 07:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
